metadata.title: How to Add YouTube Chapters 2025: Timestamps Guide
metadata.description: Learn to add chapters to YouTube videos. Timestamps that help viewers navigate and boost engagement.

hero.headline: How to Add Chapters to YouTube Videos
hero.subheadline: Help viewers find what they need. Chapters improve navigation and engagement.

sections.content: YouTube chapters break your video into navigable sections. Viewers can jump to specific topics, and chapters appear in search results. They improve user experience, increase watch time, and can boost SEO. Here's how to add them effectively.

sections.title: Adding Chapters Manually
content: Add timestamps in format 0:00 Chapter Name

content.title: Start at 0:00
content.description: First chapter must begin at 0:00 or chapters won't work.

content.title: Minimum 3 Chapters
content.description: YouTube requires at least 3 to enable the feature.

content.title: Descriptive Names
content.description: Use keywords in chapter titles. They're searchable.

sections.title: Why Chapters Matter
content: Shows video structure at a glance

faq.question: Why aren't my chapters showing?
faq.answer: Check: First timestamp must be 0:00. Need minimum 3 chapters. Each must be 10+ seconds. Format must be 0:00 Title (space after timestamp).

faq.question: Should I use auto chapters?
faq.answer: Test them first. Auto-generated can be inaccurate or poorly named. Manual chapters with good keywords are better for SEO.

faq.question: How many chapters should I have?
faq.answer: Depends on video length. Generally one chapter per main topic. 5-10 chapters for a 15-20 minute video is typical.

faq.question: Do chapters affect the algorithm?
faq.answer: Indirectly. Chapters improve user experience, reduce bounce rate, and can increase watch timeâ€”all positive signals.
